Collateral Inventory.description:
1.  Document is titled "Collateral Inventory" 

2.  This page shows a list of document names

Term Note.description:
1. This is a promissory note

2.  Document may be called Term Note

fields.name: Date
fields.description:
1.  This is the date at the top of the document 
2.  This is not the signature date at the bottom of the document
3.  This is not the executed as of date
4.  This is the date between the loan number and loan amount

fields.name: Borrower
fields.description:
1.  Only extract the Borrower names in the first paragraph
2. Do not list duplicates
3. Do not include Velocity
4. Do not include the Lender

fields.name: First Payment Date
fields.description: This is the date listed after "commencing on"

fields.name: Maturity Date
fields.description: The date by which the loan must be fully repaid, as specified in the document.

fields.name: Prepayment Penalty
fields.description:
1.  Percentage
2. If the chart ends on page 1 continue the chart on page 2
3.  If the data is 5%, 4%, 3%, include 2% and 1%

fields.name: Signatures
fields.description: Extract all signatures in the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Name
prompt_schema.description: 1. This name is found under [SIGN] and is the name of the person that will sign the document.                                             2. Do not include duplicates

prompt_schema.name: Signed
prompt_schema.description: This is whether the person has actually signed the document. The document is signed if [SIGN ] is present. Return Yes if [SIGN] is present. Return No if [SIGN] is not present.

prompt_schema.name: Signer Description
prompt_schema.description: This is the role of the signer. It is found under the name of the signer.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Date
prompt_schema.description: This is the date in which the document is signed.

fields.name: Executed as of Date
fields.description:
1.  Look for the signature section of the document.  This typically found at the end of the document.  

2.  Find the "Executed as of" date under "Signatures" 

3.  Do not extract the date from any other section of the document.

Commercial Mortgage.description:
1. May be titled "Commercial Mortgage Agreement", "Deed of Trust", "Security Agreement", "Open-End Mortgage Commercial Mortgage Security Agreement" or similarly

2.  The document will contain definitions or clauses about the mortgage, property, obligations, conditions to grant and so on.

3. The document will be signed by the Mortgagor and Acknowledged before a person.

4.  This document will have an "Exhibit A" which includes the Legal Property Description, and then an Exhibit B.

5.  Include the Planned Unit Development Rider (PUD Rider) if present

6.  Include the Condominium Rider (Condo Rider) if present

7.  Include the "Legal Description", Exhibit "A" Property Description, "Schedule A" or "Schedule C"

8.  Include all pages of the "Legal Property Description", which may use words such as situate, contain, bound, lot, block, piece, or parcel

9.  Include the "Illinois Anti-Predatory Lending Database Program"

fields.name: Certified copy of orig stamp
fields.description: Is this certified to be a true and exact copy of original via a stamp?
fields.prompt: Is there a stamp showing this is a certified true copy of original?

fields.name: Executed as of date
fields.description:
1.  Look for the "Executed as of" date under where it says Signatures
2.  This is under where it says Signatures near the end of the document
3.  Do not extract the date from any other part of the document..

fields.name: Real property address
fields.description:
1.  Extract the real property addresses listed on the document.
2. This follows "the subject matter of this Deed of Trust has the following address(es):" 
3. Do not include address descriptions.  Do not include Lot or Block

fields.name: Borrower
fields.description:
1.  Only extract "Borrower" names 
2. Do not include duplicates
3. Do not include Velocity
4. Do not include names listed as "Lender"

fields.name: Notary Stamp
fields.description: Notary stamp is present. Return yes or no

fields.name: Notary Acknowledgement
fields.description: Extracts all written information provided by the notary.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.

prompt_schema.name: County
prompt_schema.description: This is the county written in.

prompt_schema.name: Date
prompt_schema.description: This is the date the instrument was acknowledged

prompt_schema.name: Identification type
prompt_schema.description: This is the type of identification produced to confirm identity.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Name
prompt_schema.description: This name is found under [SIGN] and is the name of the person that will sign the document.

prompt_schema.name: Signed
prompt_schema.description: This is whether the person has actually signed the document. The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.  Return Yes if [SIGN] is present.  Return No if [SIGN] is not present.

prompt_schema.name: Printed Name
prompt_schema.description: This is the hand printed name of the signer.

prompt_schema.name: Commission expires date
prompt_schema.description: This is the date in which the notary's commission expires

fields.name: Signatures
fields.description: Extract all signatures in the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Name
prompt_schema.description: This name is found under [SIGN] and is the name of the person that will sign the document.

prompt_schema.name: Signed
prompt_schema.description: This is whether the person has actually signed the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.  Return Yes is [SIGN] is present. Return No if [SIGN] is not present.

prompt_schema.name: Signer Description
prompt_schema.description: This is the role of the signer.  It is found under the name of the signer.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Date
prompt_schema.description: This is the date in which the document is signed.

Cert As To Oil And Haz Mat.description:
1.  The document is titled "Certificate as to Oil and Hazardous Materials".

2.  Only include this document that says "Certificate as to Oil and Hazardous Materials"

3.  This document is signed by an Indemnitor or Indemnitors

4.  This document mentions Environmental Law, Hazardous Materials, and Indemnitors.

5.  The document must include the term Hazardous materials

fields.name: Executed as of date
fields.description:
1.  Look for the signature section of the document.  This typically found at the end of the document.  

2.  Find the "Executed as of" date in the signature section

3.  Do not extract the date from any other section of the document.

fields.name: Indemnitors
fields.description:
1. Extract all names and addresses of indemnitors
2. Do NOT include duplicates
3. Only list names listed on this document after it says "Indemnitors"

prompt_schema.name: Indemnitors
prompt_schema.description: This is the name of the individual name or business names

fields.name: Signatures
fields.description: Extract all signatures in the document. The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.  Also extract the date the document was signed.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Name
prompt_schema.description: This name is found under [SIGN] and is the name of the person that will sign the document.

prompt_schema.name: Signed
prompt_schema.description: This is whether the person has actually signed the document. The document is signed if [SIGN ] is present. Return Yes if [SIGN] is present. Return No if [SIGN] is not present.

prompt_schema.name: Signer Description
prompt_schema.description: This is the role of the signer. It is found under the name of the signer.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Date
prompt_schema.description: Date in which the document is signed.

Agreement To Provide Insurance.description:
1.  Document is titled "Agreement to Provide Insurance"

2.  Only include this document that says "Agreement to Provide Insurance"

3.  This is an agreement between the owner and the lender.

4.  Owner agrees to arrange and pay for property insurance coverage

5.  The document ends with a signature from the owner.

6.  This document mentions Credit Accommodations, Description of Collateral and Coverage Required, Required Insurance Provisions, Failure to Provide Evidence of Insurance, Cancellation and Endorsement

fields.name: Owner
fields.description:
1. Extract all names of owners
2. Only include names on this document listed after "Owners"

fields.name: Property Addresses
fields.description:
1.  Extract all of the real property addresses listed on the document.
2.  This is not the borrower's or lender's address
3.  Include only the address listed after "Real property located at"

prompt_schema.name: Real Property Addresses
prompt_schema.description: List all of the real property addresses on the document.

prompt_schema.name: Insurance Coverage Amount
prompt_schema.description: Insurance Amount

prompt_schema.name: Signed
prompt_schema.description: This is whether the person has actually signed the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.  Return Yes if [SIGN] is present.  Return No if [SIGN] is not present.

prompt_schema.description: This is the role of the signer.  It is found under the name of the signer.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Date
prompt_schema.description: This isthe date in which the document was signed.

Anti Coercion Disclosure.description:
1.  The document is titled "Anti-Coercion Disclosure".

2.  This document is required under Rule 69B-124.002, F.A.C.

3.  This document is specific to the state of Florida

4.  The document states that the lender may not require the borrower to take insurance through any particular insurance agent or company.

5.  The document ends with a signature from the owners.

fields.description: This is the date of the document

fields.name: Owner

Consent To Garnishment.description:
1.  The top of the pages reads "(Attach this form to the loan document(s) identified below.)"

2.  This document will read "Re: Consent to Garnishment" 

3.  The document includes consent to garnishment against disposable earnings.

4.  The document says You can waive this protection only by signing this document.  By signing below, you agree to waive the protection from garnishment.

5. The document is specific to the state of Florida

6.  This is NOT The Consent to the Use of Tax Information document.

Business Purpose Of Loan Cert.description:
1.  The document is titled "Business Purpose Of Loan Certification".

2.  This document discusses the business purpose of this loan.

3.  This document states "No part of the Loan proceeds are intended to be used by Borrower for a non-business (i.e., consumer) purpose."

Cert Of Non Owner Occupancy.description:
1.  The document is titled "Certification Of Non-Owner Occupancy And Indemnity"

2.  On this document, the borrower confirms they will not occupy the property.  Lender has stressed the importance of knowing whether the Property will be occupied by Owner as his or her principal residence. 

3.  Requires a hand-written address in section 3A.

4.  Document requires a notary

5.  This document states "Owner has his or her true and only principal residence located at:"

fields.name: Is there a Notary Stamp
fields.description:
1.  In the signature section at the end of the document, there is a signature line for Notary. 

2.  There should be a notary stamp near the notary signature line.

3.  The notary stamp will include the name of the notary.  The stamp will say "Notary" public.  The stamp will include the commission expiration date.

4.  Is there a stamp with the notary's name and commission expiration date?  Return Yes if there is a stamp.  Return No if there is no stamp

2.  Document includes also known as names the borrower must sign

3.  The document includes a section to be completed by the notary

4.  Only this document states "THIS IS TO CERTIFY THAT MY LEGAL SIGNATURE IS WRITTEN ANS TYPED BELOW"

Final Title Policy.description:
1.  A Final Title Policy may be titled "ALTA Loan Policy of Title Insurance"

2.  This document can include commitment conditions, a Schedule A including vesting information, a Schedule B, a Schedule C, a legal description, and an endorsement.

3.  The document does NOT have a Commitment Date.

Cert As To Drug Related Act.description:
1.  This document is titled "Certificate as to Drug Related Activities".

2.  The document explains that the borrower cannot engage in any Drug-Related Activities and shall not make any payments to Lender from funds derived from Drug-Related Activities.

Certificate Of Authority.description:
1.  This document is the "Authority Document" and may be titled "Certificate of Authority", "Corporate Authority" or "Non-Profit Authority". 

2.  This document includes the member of the company, the attached exhibits A and B, the operating agreement, the authorized actions of the member, and the date of execution

3.  The document states "The above named Manager acting on behalf of the Limited Liability Company is authorized and empowered"

4.  According to Exhibit A and Exhibit B, include Articles of Organization

5.   According to Exhibit A and Exhibit B, include Operating Agreement

6.  According to Exhibit A and Exhibit B, include Limited Liability Company Agreement

Disclosure For Conf Of Judge.description:
1.  The document is titled "Disclosure For Confession Of Judgement (Pennsylvania)"

2.  This document is specific to the state of Pennsylvania

3.  Document states "THE UNDERSIGNED ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT THE ABOVE DOCUMENT(S) CONTAIN(S) PROVISIONS UNDER WHICH LENDER MAY ENTER JUDGEMENT BY CONFESSION AGAINST THE UNDERSIGNED."

W 9 Individual.description:
1.  This is the W-9 form for an individual person only

2.  Look for an individual's first and last name

3.  There will be a Social Security Number

4.  This document should NOT be combined with the W-9 for the business

5.  ONLY classify as the W9 Individual if there is only a name under "Name (as shown on your income tax return)"

2.  Format needs to be xxx-xx-xxxx

1.  This document is titled "Consent To Use Tax Return Information"

2.  This form discusses sharing tax return information.  This is for the individual guarantor.

3.  The document states "I understand, acknowledge, and agree that the Lender and Other Loan Participants can obtain, use and share tax return information"

Automatic Clearing House App.description:
1.  The document is titled "Automatic Clearing House Application"

2.  This document discusses the Direct Debit program and authorizes automatic ACH debits

3.  The document mentions PHH Mortgage Services

fields.name: Loan Number
fields.description: Loan Number

Lenders Instructions.description:
1. Document is titled "Lender's Instructions & Figures"

2. This document shows Funding Conditions, a Document List, and the borrower's signature.

3.  The document ends with "Please acknowledge receipt" and the borrower's signature

4.  Do not include any other documents with this document

5.  This document does NOT mention Payment Instructions

6.  Do NOT include Payment Instructions in this class

fields.name: Date
fields.description: Proposed Date of Signing

fields.name: Loan Number
fields.description: Loan Number

fields.name: Borrower
fields.description:

2. Do not include duplicates
3. Do not include Velocity
4. Do not include names listed as "Lender"

fields.description: Extract all signatures in the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.

prompt_schema.name: Signature Name
prompt_schema.description: This name is found under [SIGN] and is the name of the person that will sign the document.

prompt_schema.name: Signed
prompt_schema.description: This is whether the person has actually signed the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.  Return Yes if [SIGN] is present.  Return No if [SIGN] is not present.

prompt_schema.name: Signer Description
prompt_schema.description: This is the role of the signer.  It is found under the name of the signer.

prompt_schema.name: Signed Date
prompt_schema.description: The is the date in which the document is signed.

Payment Instructions.description:
1.  This document is titled "Payment Instructions"

2. This document is NOT part of the "Lenders Instructions" class

3.  This document tells the borrower to "Please send a check or money order to PHH Mortgage Services"

4. This document mentions "Lockbox {Regular Mail)"

5.  This document provides "Servicing Contact Information for Borrower"

6.  This document includes Property Tax Impounds, City Tax Impounds, School Tax Impounds, Hazard Insurance Impounds and the Total Monthly Payment

7.  The document ends with a signature from the borrower.

8.  This document stands on its own and should not be combined with any other document.

9.  Only this document states "Important! Please verify the following information is correct and complete!"

1.  The document is titled "Loan Agreement".  

2.  Lender agrees to make a loan to the Borrower

3.  This document includes a signature and stamp from an employee of Velocity.

fields.description:
1.  Look for the Signature section of the document.  This is typically found at the end of the document.   

2.  Find the "Executed as of" date under where it says Signatures

3.  Do not extract the date from any other section of the document.

1.  Only extract the Borrower names in the first paragraph
2. Do not list duplicates
3. Do not include Velocity
4. Do not include the Lender
5. Do not include Velocity employees

fields.name: Signature Stamp
fields.description:
1.  Extract all signatures in the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present. 

2.  In case you are able to identify a signature, are you able to find the name of the person who has signed the document and their job title?  

3.  If so, strictly return "Yes".  If not, strictly return "No".  Do not return any other value.

Interim Interest Payment Disc.description:
1. The document is titled, "Interim Interest Payment Disclosure"

2. Discusses how loan proceeds and interest will be disbursed.

3. The document is specific to the state of California

4.  The document includes a page titled "Licensee's Certificate of Compliance"

W 9 Entity.description:
1.  This is the W-9 form for a business only

2.  Look for a business name

3.  There will be an Employment Identification Number

4.  This document should NOT be combined with the W9 for the individual borrower

5.  ONLY classify as the W9 Entity if there is a name under "Business name/disregard entity name, if different from above"

fields.name: Business Name
fields.description:
1. Include the Business Name
2. Business name is not Velocity

fields.name: Employer ID Number
fields.description:
1.  Employer Identification Number
2. Format needs to be xx-xxxxxxx

fields.description: Extract the signature in the document.  The document is signed if [SIGN] is present.

Unlimited Guaranty.description:
1.  This document is titled "Unlimited Guaranty"  

2.  This document guarantees the full and punctual payment of the loan.

3.  Make sure that this is NOT a Consent to Garnishment.

4.  The document states "this Unlimited Guaranty (this "Guaranty") and the enforcement thereof, and also guarantees the due performance by the Borrower of all its obligations under all other present and future contracts and agreements with Lender."

fields.name: Borrower
fields.description:
1. Extract all names of borrowers. 
2.  Include the full title of the business, including "limited liability company"

2.  Find the Executed as of date in the signature section

3.  Do not extract the date from any other section of the document.

Waiver Of Ins And Tax.description:
1.  This document is titled "Waiver Of Insurance And Tax Escrows"

2.  This document explains that the lender waives the 
 requirement for monthly deposits of insurance escrow funds.

3.  The document holds the Borrower responsible for the timely payment of any and all property tax assessments, leasehold payments, ground rents, and hazard or property insurance premiums

4.  This document is NOT the Hardship Letter

1.  This document is titled "Hardship Letter"

2.  This document mentions the date the document is dated, the date the first payment will begin, and the amount of the payment

3.   The borrow confirms the payment will not be a hardship to them.

Real Estate Property Insurance.description:
1. The document is says " Re: Real Estate Property Insurance Disclosure" 

2. The document cites "California Civil Code Section 2955.5(b )"

3.  The document requires that a lender provide this disclosure to a borrower

4. The document is specific to the state of California

5.  This document is NOT the "Evidence of Property Insurance" document

Affidavit Of Title.description:
1.  This document is only titled "Affidavit Of Title"

2.  This document is specific to the state of New Jersey

3.  This form in NOT the T-47 Residential Real Property Affidavit

4.  This document is NOT the Judgement Affidavit, the Affidavit as to existing mortgages, the Affidavit regarding survey matters

5.  Use this class ONLY if it says "Affidavit of Title"

fields.name: Notary stamp
fields.description:
1.  In the signature section at the end of the document, there is a signature line for Notary. 

2.  There should be a notary stamp near the notary signature line.

3.  The notary stamp will include the name of the notary.  The stamp will say "Notary" public.  The stamp will include the commission expiration date.

4.  Is there a stamp with the notary's name and commission expiration date?  Return Yes if there is a stamp.  Return No if there is no stamp

Desigination Of Homestead.description:
1.  This document is titled "Designation Of Homestead And Affidavit Of Non Homestead"

2.  In this document, the borrower confirms they do not now and do not intend ever to reside on, use in any manner, or claim my Non \­Homestead Property described in item 4 above as a business or residence homestead.

3. This document is signed by the borrower and a notary

4. This document is specific to the state of Texas

Notice Of Final Agreement.description:
1.  This document is titled "Notice of Final Agreement."

2.  This document represents the final agreement between the parties and may not be contradicted by evidence of prior, contemporaneous, or subsequent oral agreements of the parties.  There are no unwritten oral agreements between the parties.

3.  This document is specific to the state of Texas

4.  This document is NOT the Note, this is a Notice

Limited Power Of Attorney to.description:
1. The document is titled, "Limited Power Of Attorney To Correct Documents"

2. The document is specific to the state of Texas

3.  The document explains in the event this Limited Power of Attorney is exercised, Borrower will be notified

4.  The document states this Limited Power of Attorney shall automatically terminate upon full payment of the Loan

5.  This document is must say "to Correct Documents" in the title

6.  Do NOT classify if it says "Non Duarble"

7. Do NOT classify if it says Power of Attorney Checklist

2.  Notice that insurance coverage will be purchased for the borrower if the borrower does not show evidence of insurance coverage

3.  Form is specific to the state of Illinois

Settlement Statement Final HUD.description:
1.  The document is titled "Estimated Settlement Statement", "Final Settlement Statement" "Final HUD" or "HUD"

2.  Document mostly shows facts and figures for loan payments.  Includes type of loan, summary of borrower's transactions, summary of seller's transactions, settlement charges, and signatures.

Wire Instructions.description: This is a document that includes wiring information

Miscellaneous.description:
1. Include if it says "Welcome to PHH Mortgage Services!"

2.  Include if it says "Here's all the information you'll need to make your loan payments."

3. Include if it says "Attention Closing Agent(s):  PLEASE STOP AND READ CAREFULLY"

4.  Include if this document says "PLEASE RETURN ORIGINAL EXECUTED LOAN PACKAGE TO:"

5.  Include if this document is a Letter of Explanation

6.  Include if this document is a letter that explains how the money will be used

7.  Include if this document is the T-47 Residential Real Property Affidavit

8.  Include if this document is the Judgement Affidavit, the Affidavit as to existing mortgages, the Affidavit regarding survey matters, the Affidavit of Consideration for Use by Seller

9. Include if it says "Non Duarble Limited Power of Attorney"

10. Include if it says Power of Attorney Checklist

11.  Include if it says "This Deed" or will be 

12. Include if it is titled Quit Claim Deed or Warranty Deed

Preliminary Report.description:
1. This document can include commitment conditions, a Schedule A including vesting information, a Schedule B, a Schedule C, a legal description, and an endorsement.

2.  The document MUST have a "Commitment Date"

3.  The Preliminary report will include insurance documents. 

4. Include pages titled "Evidence of Property Insurance", "Closing Protection Letter", "ALTA Commitment for Title Insurance", "Recording and Endorsement Cover Page", "Statutory Notice", 
Owner's Title Insurance Policy", "Notice to Purchaser of Right to Obtain Owner Agreement and Certification", "Premium Notice Declarations"

10431.name: fail_everytime
